item.title: What I Am Doing Now
item.description: Controled Cold Exposures After reading about Wim Hof, it was no-brainer to at least give it a shot. So far I've been: doing cold water immersion – full body, water temperature 10-4 Â°C, time in water between 1—2 minutes walking bare foot in the snow wearing fewer clothes in the winter Experimenting With Lower Carbohydrates Intake It was sad moment to realize after following dietary discussion for couple of months that still the best advice regarding one diet is to simply experiment and observe what works for you.
